From: soggyboysmom
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, August 11, 2005 12:02 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] Re: t-shirt orders


--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Nichole Fausey-Khosraviani"
<ms_fausey@y...> wrote:
> Kelly, where on the website is the tee-shirt information? I can't
>seem to find it.
Not Kelly but I found info on the t-shirts by opening up the
registration form and scrolling down a bit (past where you fill in the
names for the badges). Adult sizes $12, Kids $10
